TestCase.name: testComplexCondition1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM x WHERE (a = 1 AND b = 2) OR (NOT(a <> 1) AND c = 3) AND true AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM y WHERE x.a = y.d AND 2=2 AND (SELECT count(*) FROM z WHERE i = 5 AND j = 6) > 0)

TestCase.name: testComplexCondition2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM x WHERE (a = 1 AND b = 2) OR (NOT(a <> 1) AND c = 3) AND true AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM y WHERE x.a = y.d AND (SELECT count(*) FROM z WHERE (i = 5 AND j = 6) OR (NOT (i <> 5) AND j = 7) AND true) > 0)

TestCase.name: testComplexCondition3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM x WHERE (a = 1 AND b = 2) OR (NOT(a <> 1) AND c = 3) AND true AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM y WHERE x.a = y.d AND 2=2 AND (SELECT count(*) FROM z WHERE (i = 5 AND j = 6) OR (NOT (i <> 5) AND j = 7) AND true) > 0)

TestCase.name: testSimpleCondition
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM x WHERE (a = 1 AND b = 2) OR (NOT(a <> 1) AND c = 3) AND true

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($1, 2)), AND(NOT(<>($0, 1)), =($2, 3), true))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, 1), OR(=($1, 2), =($2, 3)))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

TestCase.name: testSimpleConditionWithCastToFalse
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM x WHERE CAST(0 AS BOOLEAN)
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[CAST(0):BOOLEAN NOT NULL]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[false]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

TestCase.name: testSimpleConditionWithCastToTrue
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM x WHERE CAST(200 AS BOOLEAN)
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[CAST(200):BOOLEAN NOT NULL]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

TestCase.name: testSimplifyConditionInSubQuery1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM x WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM y WHERE (d = 1 AND e = 2) OR (NOT (d <> 1) AND e = 3)) AND true

TestCase.name: testSimplifyConditionInSubQuery2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM x WHERE (a = 1 AND b = 2) OR (NOT (a <> 1) AND b = 3) AND true AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM y WHERE d > 10)

TestCase.name: testSimplifyConditionInSubQuery3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM x WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM y WHERE d IN (SELECT i FROM z WHERE (i = 1 AND j = 2) OR (NOT (i <> 1) AND j = 3) AND true) AND e > 10)
